item.description:
We will pair English & Japanese speakers together to work on vocabulary, grammar, reading, & speaking skills. Please bring any books that you feel are helpful.

I am also looking for a co-organizer, especially a native Japanese speaker.
item.how_to_find_us: The location has not been confirmed yet. However, if we are at the Stata building, you will likely see tables pulled together. Look for the meetup sign on the tables.
item.why: You'll have a chance to work towards your own language goals.
item.name: Japanese and English Study Night
